casebody.data:
NC STATE BOARD OF EDUCATION
v.
The STATE of NC, et al. 110PA16-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. November 16, 2017 Christopher G. Browning, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for The North Carolina Rules Review Commission. Amar Majmundar, Special Deputy Attorney General, Olga Vysotskaya de Brito, Assistant Attorney General, for The State of North Carolina. Robert F. Orr, Attorney at Law, Asheville, Andrew H. Erteschik, Attorney at Law, Saad Gul, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, John Michael Durnovich, Attorney at Law, for North Carolina State Board of Education.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 15th of November 2017 by Plaintiff:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 16th of November 2017."

Plaintiff shall have up to and including the 22nd day of December 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
